org.theta4j

Interface ThetaEventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ThetaEventAdapter

    public interface ThetaEventListener
    The listener interface for the events of RICOH THETA.
    See Also:
    Theta.addListener(ThetaEventListener), Theta.removeListener(ThetaEventListener)
